docs.snippet: WARDEN LAWES of Sing Sing can go back more  than thirty-five years in his knowledge of murderers. In fact, the first prisoner he ever spoke to was a murderer, and, what is more important, the murderer gave the inexperienced guard some good advice.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 18 (UP)--National Herrerista party members of Congress reiterated today firm opposition to creation of naval bases in Uruguay in cooperation with the United States and thus brought to a head the Cabinet crisis created by the...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 18 (UP)--National Herrerista party members of Congress reiterated today firm opposition to creation of naval bases in Uruguay in cooperation with the United States and thus brought to a head the Cabinet crisis created by the resignation of Turibio Olasso, Minister of Public Instruction.
